name: The Boss of Edge Inc.
description:
At last, now is your chance! Tired from working at Edge Industries, your boss has decided to give his job to the hardest working employee. Yes, you could try to work diligently to take the job. OR you could hack your employees' computers, stealing their ranks!

The Boss of Edge Inc is a fast-paced and exciting game where to attempt to hack your employees' computers while trying yourself to guard your own device. Some features include:

  • Upgrade your wifi!
  • Battle other employees!
  • Receive random notifications!
  • Get promoted!
  • ...and more!

If you enjoy the game, please leave a review!

CONTROLS

WASD = move

RMB = throw coffee mug

LMB = punch
